location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Captain Evan Jervis, late Paymaster, Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication, dated 19 March 1822. In response, it explains the background behind two bills negotiated at Bushire by James Dow during his time in charge at the Residency; the bills were drawn by Lieutenant Price.
